resources.string:
PERSONAL INFORMATION. 

This app is made in consideration with your privacy in mind, so the publisher of this app do not collect any personally identifiable information about you. 

In other words, the publisher of this app do not collect information such as your name, address, phone number, email address or precise geographic location.



NO WARRANTY. 

All articles in the app are displayed "as is", provided by Hacker News, and not owned by the publisher of this app. 

These articles are displayed to you without warranties or conditions of any kind from the publisher of this app, whether oral or written, express or implied.
